snippet: New options like Airbnb were unimaginable six months ago, and they reflect the growing range of travel choices borne of the détente between the two countries.
abstract: More Americans are traveling to Cuba since restoration of diplomatic relations between countries and many travel companies are offering services there; tourism is still officially banned under US embargo and visitors must qualify for licensed travel in one of 12 categories.
lead_paragraph: New options like Airbnb were unimaginable six months ago, and they reflect the growing range of travel choices borne of the détente between the two countries.

headline.print_headline: As New Services Pop Up, Travel to Cuba Becomes Easier
headline.main: Ready to Go to Cuba? It Has Gotten Even Easier
